name: Gnostic: Survivors
description: Gnostic: Survivors is a survivor style 3rd person co-op game where you pick your weapon, level up to unlock legendary upgrades and survive the never ending horde of enemies. Choose from a variety of weapons, each with their own unique playstyle and abilities. Defend against many different enemies and survive the various world events that will try to stop you. Play solo or with up to 3 friends.
